Note we only temporarily store your wallet information, please make sure to back up your wallet information.
Recovery Phrase A recovery phrase is a series of 15 easy to remember words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet.

Please have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down. Screenshots or digitally saved phrases are easier to be hacked.
